body_html:
You have to recreate the freeze model to ensure that the N-channel is "?".
Refer to this:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/40586471/what-is-the-best-way-to-run-saved-model-with-different-batch-size-in-tensorflow?rq=1
Since the graph is appendable-only, I think you must recreate it with desired input dims at the beginning.

BTW, you'd better take a look at the description before submitting an issue. A rule is a rule.

body:
You have to recreate the freeze model to ensure that the N-channel is "?".
Refer to this:[https://stackoverflow.com/questions/40586471/what-is-the-best-way-to-run-saved-model-with-different-batch-size-in-tensorflow?rq=1](url)
Since the graph is appendable-only, I think you must recreate it with desired input dims at the beginning.

BTW, you'd better take a look at the description before submitting an issue. A rule is a rule.
